titles.title: To prohibit certain large business entities from purchasing the securities of those entities on national securities exchanges, and for other purposes.
Stop Welfare for Any Large Monopoly Amassing Revenue from Taxpayers Act of 2018
Stop Welfare for Any Large Monopoly Amassing Revenue from Taxpayers Act of 2018
Stop Welfare for Any Large Monopoly Amassing Revenue from Taxpayers Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committee on Education and the Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
